get.description: Retrieves a list of Archivist assets

206.description: The number of assets exceeds the servers limit. The approximate number of matching results is provided by the x-total-count header if the 'x-request-total-count' header on the request is set to 'true'. The exact limit is available in the content-range header. The value format is 'items 0-LIMIT/TOTAL'. Note that x-total-count is always present for 200 and 206 responses. It is the servers best available approximation. Similarly, in any result set, you may get a few more than LIMIT items.

401.description: Returned when the user is not authenticated to the system.

403.description: Returned when the user is not authorized to list Assets.

429.description: Returned when a user exceeds their subscription's rate limit for requests.
